content: tiilda mittens by inese sang all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 1 size one size - to fit 7 -7 5 18 cm-19 cm hand circumference yarn bulky chunky weight approximately 120 yds 110 m pictured in deramores vintage chunky 50% merino wool 50% acrylic 153 yds 140 m / 100 gr colour chalk needles us 6 4 mm double pointed needles or circulars with 32 80 cm cable if using magic loop method us 8 5 mm double pointed needles or circulars with 32 80 cm cable if using magic loop method gauge 15 sts x 22 row to 4 10 cm in stockinette on larger size needles notions cable needle optional if you prefer working cables with a cable needle tapestry needle stitch marker optional to mark the beginning of round scrap yarn abbreviations & stitch guide co cast on bobble bind off sts - stitches k knit p purl m1r make one right insert left needle from back to front under the strand of yarn which runs between the stitch just worked and the next stitch on left hand needle lift the strand up and knit through the front loop m1l make one left insert left hand needle from front to back under the strand of yarn which runs between the stitch just worked and the next stitch on left hand needle lift the strand up and knit through back loop c2b slip next stitch onto cable needle and hold at the back of work k1 then k1 from the cable needle c2f slip next stitch onto cable needle and hold at the front of work k1 then k1 from the cable needle all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 2 c4b slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at the back of work k2 then k2 from the cable needle c4f slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at the front of work k2 then k2 from the cable needle ssk slip slip knit slip next 2 sts one by one knitwise return them to left hand needle then knit them together through the back of the loops k2tog knit 2 sts together repeat repeat round / rnds round / rounds pattern begins using us 6 4 mm needles and the long tail cast on co 32 sts join to begin working in the round making sure not to twist the stitches ribbing round 1 *k1 p repeat from * to end repeat round 1 for 13 more times set up round change to us 8 5 mm needles k3 m1r k10 m1l k4 p1 k2 p1 k6 p1 k2 p1 k1 34 sts main body refer to chart 1 on page 5 for central cable pattern round 1 k19 p1 k2 p1 k6 p1
